name: Cambia Foto
children: As a Provayap.Valid.User1
Given Login Page_Yap is open
Given I click on Annulla_Impronta_Digitale if present
Given I wait 2 seconds
When I click on element Input_1
When I click on element Input_4
When I click on element Input_7
When I click on element Input_2
When I click on element Input_5
When I click on element Input_8
Given Home Page_Yap is open
When I click on element Burger_Menu_Open
Given I wait 2 seconds
When I click on element Profilo
Given Profilo Page_Yap is open
Then ProfiloLabel is displayed
Given ProfiloLabel data matches Provayap.Labels
When I click on element Cambia_Foto
When I click on element Bottone_Galleria
When I click on element Bottone_Camera
When I click on element Bottone_Foto
Given ProfiloLabel data matches Provayap.Labels
When I click on element CTA_Back
Given Home Page_Yap is open
Then Yap_Card is displayed
Given I wait 2 seconds
